Uses of Interface
risk.model.playerutils.IPlayer

  • Packages that use IPlayer 
    Package Description
    risk.game
    The game package holds the driver and the Game Engine
    risk.model
    The model package holds the board and the players
    risk.model.maputils
    The risk.model.maputils package contains the class implementing the territory The riskBoard and the continent classes
    risk.model.playerutils
    The Player utils package contains the classes necessary for the creation and work of a player object
    risk.model.playerutils.strategy
    The Player utils package strategy contains the strategy implementation
    risk.utils  
    risk.views.ui
    Package contains the various UI components of the risk game
    test.risk.game  
    test.risk.model  
    test.risk.utils
